amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 429, which prohibits the use of funds to develop any regulations pertaining to the definitions of "fill material" or "discharge of fill material" for the purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 429, which prohibits the use of funds to develop any regulations pertaining to the definitions of "fill material" or "discharge of fill material" for the purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Beyer.
